name: Cave Killers
description:
YOU are a tiny alien, who has fallen from the sky and landed in a mysterious cave deep underground (beneath the earth)... you must figure out how to survive in this strange environment, surrounded by deadly enemies and woorms... you must escape the cave killers

Controls

LMB: Use primary weapon

RMB: Use secondary weapon

W/D: Move

Space: Jump

Credits

Sound: MixKit, Kevin Macleod, Pixabay.com

Zak+Arnav: programming

Hannah: art
